projectInfo.title: IdGaf Creative | Web
projectInfo.summary: Bold Informative Mobile-First Website Proposal for Idgaf Creative
projectInfo.introduction: IdGaf Creative requested a simple website that contained two things: a description of the studio's motives and where to reach them. I played around with this simple idea and added several fun features to the website so users who check twice in a day see different things. The home screen background changes based on the time of the day of the user. In the morning it shows a sunny beach; in the afternoon, a sunset near a boardwalk; and at night, space. This website incorporates HTML, CSS, and JS in order to create a fluid and dynamic user experience.

work.title: Old Proposal
work.description: These next few images show my old website proposal, before the suggested face-lift. It was bright, but too bright. It was simple, but too simple for a growing business that might need a content management system (CMS).

content.rendered: IdGaf Creative requested a simple website that contained two things: a description of the studio’s motives and where to reach them. I played around with this simple idea and added several fun features to the website so users who check twice in a day see different things. The home screen background changes based on the time of the day of the user. In the morning it shows a sunny beach; in the afternoon, a sunset near a boardwalk; and at night, space. This website incorporates HTML, CSS, and JS in order to create a fluid and dynamic user experience.
